ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectOrder to decline to vary or rescind Decision No. 21-C-A-2018 of March 13, 2018 and Decision No. 49-C-A-2018 of July 18, 2018 of the Canadian Transportation Agency
PrecisOrder declining to vary or rescind Decision No. 21-C-A-2018 of March 13, 2018 and Decision No. 49-C-A-2018 of July 18, 2018 of the CANADIAN TRANSPORTATION AGENCY and accordingly dismisses the petition of Glen Bedjanian.
